attributes.action: OAP`s Free Buss Pass To Be Valid Across The UK,
attributes.additional_details:
As A UK Citizen The Buss Pass Will Be Valid Anywhere In The UK , 
As It Can Work Out Expensive When Visiting Family.  I Would Like A Buss Pass For OAP`S to Cover The Whole Of The UK . So You Can Live In Scotland & Visit Family In England, Wales Or Ireland And Use Your OAP Buss Pass, Regardless Of Where You Live In The UK Or Where In The UK You Are Traveling.
Thank You
attributes.background: As A UK Citizen The Buss Pass Will Be Valid Anywhere In The UK , To Enable OAP`s To Visit Family/Friends In England, Scotland, Wales & Ireland. We Are Surviving on A Pension  Far Less Than Minimum Wage As A UK Citizen The Very Least They Can Do Is Give Us A UK Bus Pass

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The UK Government is only responsible for transport policy, including bus passes, for England.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require bus operators in England to accept bus passes from Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, but it would be up to the governments of Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland whether the older person's bus pass for England should be accepted in those nations.
